title: An Englishman plays American Revolution sim Liberty or Death
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Magic: The Gathering Arena is finally coming to Steam this month
description: Four years after leaving beta, Arena gets a Steam page at last.

title: You get one guess as to what this FPS called KILLBUG is about
description: A fast-paced arena shooter about surviving endless waves of bugs, for cheap.

title: Steam's search bar just got a lot better
This madcap five buck microshooter just got a surprise free content update
description: Chop some goblins, and then chop them up again why don't you?

title: What do you use those extra buttons on the side of your mouse for?
description: Back in the day we had two buttons on a mouse and that was enough!

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #686: Saturday, May 6
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: A Fallout co-creator has been revealing heater after heater of never-before-seen RPG history on YouTube, including an early Lord of the Rings RPG demo
description: Still consulting on games from "semi-retirement," Tim Cain's been doling out RPG deep lore under the radar.
